recommendations.title: Implement zone-redundant deployments
recommendations.description: Deploy critical services across multiple availability zones to improve resilience
implementation_steps: Enable zone-redundant deployment for critical services
Update load balancer configuration for multi-zone distribution

recommendations.title: Implement comprehensive monitoring and alerting
recommendations.description: Deploy Azure Monitor, Application Insights, and configure alerts
implementation_steps: Deploy Application Insights for application monitoring
Set up health probes and availability tests
Create alert rules for critical metrics

recommendations.title: Implement cross-region disaster recovery
recommendations.description: Set up secondary region for disaster recovery with appropriate replication
implementation_steps: Set up cross-region replication for data services

recommendations.title: Implement asynchronous messaging patterns
recommendations.description: Add messaging services to decouple components and improve fault tolerance
implementation_steps: Identify coupling points in current architecture
Implement Service Bus or Event Hubs
Update application code for async patterns
